document.full_text: verizon wireless was scrambling on wednesday to resolve an outage of its highest-speed u.s. wireless network, on which the top u.s. cellular carrier is relying to drive future growth.
document.title: verizon racing to fix high-speed network outage
lines_and_colors: verizon wireless was scrambling on wednesday to resolve an outage of its highest-speed u.s. wireless network, on which the top u.s. cellular carrier is relying to drive future growth.
